Detailed Description

MGObject is an abstract class which represents a whole geometry and a topology.

Member Function Documentation

MGAppearance* MGObject::appearance (  )  [inline, virtual]

Get the MGAppearance pointer of this object.

If not defined, null will be returned. See ensure_appearance().

Implements MGAttribedGel.

virtual MGObject* MGObject::clone (  )  const [pure virtual]

Construct new object by copying to newed area.

User must delete this copied object by "delete".

Implements MGGel.

Implemented in MGBSumCurve, MGCompositeCurve, MGCurve, MGEllipse, MGGeometry, MGLBRep, MGStl, MGPoint, MGRLBRep, MGStraight, MGSurfCurve, MGTrimmedCurve, MGBoundary, MGBVertex, MGCell, MGCellBase, MGCellNB, MGComplex, MGEdge, MGLoop, MGPVertex, and MGShell.

virtual void MGObject::draw3DVertex (  )  const [pure virtual]

Draw 3D point(vertex) in world coordinates.

The object is converted to point(s) and is drawn. This is valid only for topology objects or MGPoint.

Implemented in MGGeometry, MGStl, MGPoint, MGBVertex, MGCell, MGCellBase, MGCellNB, MGComplex, MGEdge, and MGPVertex.

virtual void MGObject::drawWire ( double  span_length,
int  line_density = 1 
) const [pure virtual]

Draw the object in wire mode, in the world coordinates.

The object is converted to curve(s) and is drawn.

Parameters:
span_length Line segment span length.
line_density line density to draw a surface in wire mode.

Implemented in MGCurve, MGStl, MGPoint, MGStraight, MGBVertex, MGComplex, MGEdge, and MGPVertex.

bool MGObject::has_common ( const MGObject &  obj2  )  const

Test if this and 2nd object has common area about their box(), taking error into account.

virtual MGisects MGObject::intersection ( const MGObject &  obj2  )  const [pure virtual]

Compute the intersections of two objects.

Intersections are obtained from two objects, which are known using the MGisects::object1() and object2(). NOTE**** When two objects' manifold dimension are the same, object1 is this object at the invocation of MGObject::intersection(), and object2 is the argument object. However, their manifold dimension are not the same, object1 is always the lower dimension's object and object2 is the higer dimension's object.

Implemented in MGCurve, MGStl, MGPoint, MGShell, and MGTopology.

int  line_density = 1 
) const [virtual]

Make 2 types of display list of this gel(wire and shading).

Return is the display list name.

virtual MGObject& MGObject::operator= ( const MGObject &  obj2  )  [inline, virtual]

Assignment.

When the leaf object of this and gel2 are not equal, this assignment does nothing.

virtual MGPosition MGObject::pick_closest ( const MGStraight &  sl  )  const [inline, virtual]

Compute the parameter value of the closest point from the straight to this object.

sl is the eye projection line whose direction is from yon to hither, and if sl had multiple intersection points, The closest point to the eye will be selected.

Reimplemented in MGCurve, MGBVertex, MGComplex, MGEdge, and MGPVertex.
